import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; import "./UserProfile.scss" function UserProfile() { const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: "", email: "", password: "", password_confirmation: "" }) const [userProfile, setUserProfile] = useState({ name: String, address: Text, date: Date, phone: String, }) interface ParamTypes { id: string } const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { const requestUrl = "/api/v1/users/" + id; async function fetchUser() { await axios.get(requestUrl) .then(res => setUser(res.data)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } fetchUser(); }, []) return (
